New Records: Jasprit Bumrah took four wickets for seven runs in the match
Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored 53 off 28 balls for India
Rishabh Pant scored 20 off 11 balls for India
Rashid Khan took three wickets for Afghanistan
Gulbadin Naib and Azmatullah Omarzai shared a 44-run stand for Afghanistan
Arshdeep Singh took the last three wickets for India
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma won the toss and decided to bat first for India
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's decision to bat first paid off for India
Jasprit Bumrah's spell of four for seven was crucial in India's win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
India now fly to Antigua to play Bangladesh on Saturday, June 22
Afghanistan face another tough challenge against Australia on Saturday, June 22
Others: Virat Kohli was dismissed by Rashid Khan for 0
Shivam Dube was dismissed by Rashid Khan for 0
Farooqi picked up three wickets for Afghanistan
